title: Little Rock PD dispatch archive
subtitle: Archived dispatch reports from the Little Rock Police Department
description: This is an archive of dispatch calls recorded by the Little Rock Police Department. The archive has complete reports dating to 05/13/22. Previous versions of the dataset include incomplete reports dating to 04/13/22. The dataset updates every hour with the latest reports. Every day the dataset updates with a new csv. Original dispatches for the last 8 hours can be found at: https://clrweb.littlerock.state.ar.us/pub/public_menu.php.

resources.description: Contains call types, addresses and report times for each Little Rock PD dispatch for the given day
